java/liquibase/database/DatabaseFactory.java

00001 package liquibase.database;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00004 import liquibase.log.LogFactory;
00005 
00006 import java.sql.Connection;
00007 import java.sql.SQLException;
00008 import java.util.ArrayList;
00009 import java.util.Arrays;
00010 import java.util.List;
00011 import java.util.logging.Logger;
00012 
00013 public class DatabaseFactory {
00014 
00015     private static DatabaseFactory instance = new DatabaseFactory();
00016 
00017     private static final Logger log = LogFactory.getLogger();
00018 
00019     private List<Database> implementedDatabases = new ArrayList<Database>(Arrays.asList(
00020             (Database) new OracleDatabase(),
00021             new PostgresDatabase(),
00022             new MSSQLDatabase(),
00023             new MySQLDatabase(),
00024             new DerbyDatabase(),
00025             new HsqlDatabase(),
00026             new DB2Database(),
00027             new SybaseDatabase(),
00028             new H2Database(),
00029             new CacheDatabase(),
00030             new FirebirdDatabase(),
00031             new MaxDBDatabase()
00032     ));
00033 
00034     private DatabaseFactory() {
00035     }
00036 
00037     public static DatabaseFactory getInstance() {
00038         return instance;
00039     }
00040 
00044     public List<Database> getImplementedDatabases() {
00045         return implementedDatabases;
00046     }
00047 
00048     public void addDatabaseImplementation(Database database) {
00049         implementedDatabases.add(0, database);
00050     }
00051 
00052     public Database findCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection connection) throws JDBCException {
00053         Database database = null;
00054 
00055         boolean foundImplementation = false;
00056 
00057         for (Database implementedDatabase : getImplementedDatabases()) {
00058             database = implementedDatabase;
00059             if (database.isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(connection)) {
00060                 foundImplementation = true;
00061                 break;
00062             }
00063         }
00064 
00065         if (!foundImplementation) {
00066             try {
00067                 log.warning("Unknown database: " + connection.getMetaData().getDatabaseProductName());
00068             } catch (SQLException e) {
00069                 throw new JDBCException(e);
00070             }
00071             database = new UnsupportedDatabase();
00072         }
00073 
00074         Database returnDatabase;
00075         try {
00076             returnDatabase = database.getClass().newInstance();
00077         } catch (Exception e) {
00078             throw new RuntimeException(e);
00079         }
00080         returnDatabase.setConnection(connection);
00081         return returnDatabase;
00082     }
00083 
00084     public Database findCorrectDatabaseImplementation(DatabaseConnection connection) throws JDBCException {
00085         return findCorrectDatabaseImplementation(connection.getUnderlyingConnection());
00086     }
00087 
00088     public String findDefaultDriver(String url) {
00089         for (Database database : this.getImplementedDatabases()) {
00090             String defaultDriver = database.getDefaultDriver(url);
00091             if (defaultDriver != null) {
00092                 return defaultDriver;
00093             }
00094         }
00095 
00096         return null;
00097     }
00098 
00099 
00100 }
